title: Ahead of Market: 10 things that will decide stock action on Monday
body: Tech View: Bullish Marubozu candle "Nifty closed above the crucial resistance zone of 22,250-300 levels on weekly closing basis and we believe that as long as Nifty is holding above 22,000 mark, the rally is likely to continue and it can test the next resistance zone of 22,450-500 on an immediate basis and eventually Nifty can test level of 22,700 on the higher side," said Tejas Shah ...
